## ClientPool.getClient() method

Get a client for the given zone with the shared options.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static getClient(zone: string): Client;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  zone | <code>string</code> | A valid search zone. |
